title: how do i increase my fps
body: My computer is about 6-8 years old, and my standard fps for every game is about 35-50fps. Aside from putting the game graphics settings to low/off (which i have almost all of it on low) how else can i improve my fps? I have windows 7 if that helps.

replies.body:
Hey Scarykings, 

They have a FPS KB that works pretty good. Going to put the link below and if you have any questions or need help, i'll be on for a bit! 

FPS KB: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-troubleshooting
